value.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. [PAWN_possessive] gene mother was killed in action.
[PAWN_pronoun] struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove [PAWN_possessive] right to be there. A child genius, [PAWN_pronoun] was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s parents died in a fire when [PAWN_pronoun] was seven. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up on [PAWN_possessive] aunt's farm, plowing fields and doing manual labor.
[PAWN_pronoun] could not bear answering questions about [PAWN_possessive] parents, so [PAWN_pronoun] replaced social contact with hard work.

From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] trained to be a leader of women. [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled in the Vanu Defense College when [PAWN_pronoun] was a girl and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.

A war broke on out [PAWN_nameDef]'s home planet.
Gathering what little food and belongings they could, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] gene mother stole a ship and escaped into space.

[PAWN_nameDef] was the younger of two daughters on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. [PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at [PAWN_possessive] daughters to work harder and keep quiet. [PAWN_nameDef] burnt [PAWN_possessive] hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when [PAWN_possessive] life was in danger.

Growing up in [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's lab, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the life of an intellectual elite. [PAWN_pronoun] got everything [PAWN_pronoun] desired, and price was never an object.
However [PAWN_nameDef] did not partake in the luxury given to her. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] pursued more physical, and - in [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's eyes - lower-class jobs.

A genius child, [PAWN_nameDef] was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering.
One day, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit [PAWN_objective], earning [PAWN_objective] the nickname “Squirrel Girl”.
[PAWN_nameDef] came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath [PAWN_objective].

[PAWN_nameDef] inherited a sense of duty from [PAWN_possessive] gene mother, and began a law enforcement career on [PAWN_possessive] frontier homeworld.
[PAWN_pronoun] tried to uphold the law with honor, but the corruption and greed of local government officials often discouraged her.

[PAWN_nameDef] was a quick witted, funny child. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] wandered off on [PAWN_possessive] wealthy parents, and was ultimately lost in a supposedly unused ore warehouse. Due to cloning technology, [PAWN_possessive] parents decided that the time looking for [PAWN_objective] was better spent on just cloning a better daughter.

[PAWN_nameDef] was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by [PAWN_possessive] spinal plug. [PAWN_pronoun] moved through [PAWN_possessive] daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around her. This left [PAWN_objective] nearly unable to socialize.

In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by [PAWN_possessive] tribal birth mother. She taught [PAWN_objective] survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing.
[PAWN_possessive] departed gene mother had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and [PAWN_nameDef] practiced with it every chance [PAWN_pronoun] got.

[PAWN_nameDef] helped out in [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats.
When [PAWN_pronoun] refused to clean up after the cats, [PAWN_pronoun] was transferred to the breeding science division.

[PAWN_nameDef] was not made as a woman, but a cold hearted assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. [PAWN_pronoun] was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

[PAWN_nameDef] was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by [PAWN_possessive] birth mother.
[PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond [PAWN_possessive] own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

[PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to join the army but [PAWN_possessive] gene mother didn't like the idea, so [PAWN_possessive] interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] secretly hoped that this would one day lead [PAWN_objective] to a life of galactic exploration.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born into a loving but poor family.
[PAWN_pronoun] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] had an artistic talent which [PAWN_pronoun] inherited from [PAWN_possessive] gene mother. [PAWN_possessive] birth mother taught [PAWN_objective] the benefits of hard work and determination. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a fascination with technology and military history.

Named Alex by her gene mother, [PAWN_pronoun] always felt [PAWN_pronoun] had the wrong body. Naturally lean and athletic, her mother pressured her into sports but she always preferred creative pursuits such as crafting jewelry. Luckily, [PAWN_possessive] family and friends supported [PAWN_possessive] undergoing surgey; as a teen [PAWN_pronoun] finally got the body she wanted.

Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests.
[PAWN_possessive] only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s drug-addicted birth mother died, leaving [PAWN_objective] an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, [PAWN_pronoun] resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When [PAWN_nameDef] was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took [PAWN_objective] in to give [PAWN_objective] a second chance at life.

Born to a family of fortune hunters, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a passion for ancient history.
Though never a tough or social girl, [PAWN_pronoun] loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the daughter of a high lord, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed many privileges.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned to maneuver in both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

[PAWN_nameDef] was the daughter of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in her footsteps. [PAWN_pronoun] was brought up as a kind, well trained farm girl.
[PAWN_pronoun] lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born to a poor family on a rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] gene mother sold [PAWN_objective] into slavery at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was traded many times. A tycoon bought [PAWN_objective] and sent [PAWN_objective] down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

[PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a glitterworld. Everything [PAWN_pronoun] wanted came to her. In school [PAWN_pronoun] was a social butterfly. At home, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time looking up the newest gadgets and playing [PAWN_possessive] favourite video games.

[PAWN_nameDef] was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's records, [PAWN_pronoun] invented the nuclear device that powered [PAWN_possessive] ship. Apparently, [PAWN_pronoun] also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have mothered a race of tasty golden kittens.

Standing on the ship hull with [PAWN_possessive] gene mother in an child-size EVA suit, [PAWN_nameDef] loved space from a young age.
[PAWN_pronoun] was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like [PAWN_possessive] gene mother, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking care of plants in [PAWN_possessive] messy room. [PAWN_possessive] nickname was given for [PAWN_possessive] love of circles.

The daughter of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] kept mostly to [PAWN_objective]self, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.
In [PAWN_possessive] teens, [PAWN_pronoun] ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

[PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] family lived a hard but prosperous life along with their fellow colonists on an outlying rimworld.
One day, a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found her.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial birth mother and an absent gene mother. From an early age, [PAWN_pronoun] was unhappy with the shape of her body.
Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] traveled with [PAWN_possessive] birth mother to a glitterworld and spent [PAWN_possessive] savings on a body [PAWN_pronoun] was happy with.

[PAWN_nameDef] was in a girl scout troop on a midworld.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

[PAWN_nameDef] was the daughter of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia.
[PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced [PAWN_objective] to learn to defend [PAWN_objective]self with a quick word or a quicker shot.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of [PAWN_possessive] birth mother's cab.
Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, [PAWN_pronoun] soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends.
[PAWN_pronoun] was always told by [PAWN_possessive] gene mother that 'those peasants just want your money'. So, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone, or fighting other kids.

The only daughter of a well respected mechanoid inventor, [PAWN_nameDef] had access to the materials to subvert and modify [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's creations.
[PAWN_pronoun] used drugs to increase [PAWN_possessive] productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited [PAWN_possessive] social life.

[PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, rich or poor.
[PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_possessive] temper was quick.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born in the darkest slums of [PAWN_possessive] urban homeworld. Neglected by [PAWN_possessive] birth mother, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own, battling for every scrap of food [PAWN_pronoun] saw.
Eventually, as [PAWN_possessive] talents exceeded [PAWN_possessive] peers, [PAWN_pronoun] ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left [PAWN_possessive] birth mother behind.

[PAWN_nameDef] lived on a pleasant midworld.
[PAWN_possessive] body purist birth mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

[PAWN_nameDef] served the high admiral of a space fleet. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.
In [PAWN_possessive] feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a woman of such prestige.

[PAWN_nameDef] grew up helping in [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's smithy.
They were some of the last smiths on the planet to use traditional smithing methods. They even collected some materials themselves.
Sometimes, after work, [PAWN_nameDef] would practice using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged.

[PAWN_nameDef] was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought [PAWN_objective] the product of a snake demon and human coupling.
After watching how [PAWN_possessive] human gene mother betrayed and murdered [PAWN_possessive] birth mother, [PAWN_pronoun] longed to see how many more humans [PAWN_pronoun] could get to fall into [PAWN_possessive] hands.

Born on the planet New China, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over [PAWN_possessive] daughter.
[PAWN_nameDef] had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep [PAWN_possessive] room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. [PAWN_pronoun] came to abhor violence.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. [PAWN_nameDef] would help [PAWN_possessive] gene mother whenever [PAWN_pronoun] could.
Later, [PAWN_possessive] gene mother took [PAWN_objective] as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] also took on shooting as a hobby.

Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed [PAWN_possessive] ancestral home.
The girl managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath [PAWN_possessive] family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, [PAWN_nameDef] struck out into the wasteland, alone.

[PAWN_nameDef] was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.
Once, while attempting to prove [PAWN_possessive] skills in the real world, [PAWN_pronoun] was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped, but the experience stayed with her.

[PAWN_nameDef] was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.
When the family was attacked, [PAWN_possessive] gene mother ordered [PAWN_objective] to hide in a secret cryptosleep vault.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.
Most infants died, but [PAWN_nameDef] did not. [PAWN_pronoun] killed [PAWN_possessive] first woman at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

Born to a family of traveling merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by [PAWN_possessive] gene mother in the ways of being a trader. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and bartered for [PAWN_possessive] food.

[PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a forest. [PAWN_possessive] gene mother taught [PAWN_objective] to hunt and live off the land, so that [PAWN_pronoun] could live without the need of others when gene mother died.
Accustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, [PAWN_nameDef] could survive weeks alone.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s gene mother was a starfighter pilot, and [PAWN_pronoun] always idolized the old woman.
From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] collected pilot memorabilia and studied pilot books, preparing to join the deep space navy and follow in [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's footsteps.

[PAWN_nameDef] traveled between rimworlds with [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_nameDef]'s birth mother, a renowned doctor, often delivered lectures from the hull of their retrofitted cargo/medical ship.
Sometimes, the family took on difficult long-term medical work with especially needy patients, and [PAWN_nameDef] helped where [PAWN_pronoun] could.

[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a rimworld, under the tyranny of [PAWN_possessive] gene mother, who forced [PAWN_objective] to work every day on the farm. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of escaping [PAWN_possessive] gene mother and exploring the universe.
One day, when the trade ship was overhead, [PAWN_pronoun] stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

When [PAWN_pronoun] was a baby, [PAWN_nameDef]'s birth mother went insane and left [PAWN_objective] in the woods.
Raised by wild people, [PAWN_nameDef] was known for both loving and killing animals.

[PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of a powerful company president. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful appearance led to a career as a music idol.
When [PAWN_possessive] birth mother died, [PAWN_nameDef] could not bear [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's loneliness, and became her sexual companion.

It is not uncommon for a sickly child to be cast away. What is uncommon is for that child to survive and even thrive with such a weak body.
Using [PAWN_possessive] quick wit and silver tongue, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to get out of almost any situation - most of the time at the cost others around her.

The child of a wealthy manufacturer, [PAWN_nameDef] was pampered from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] developed an affinity for reading and art, and a distaste for menial chores.
A revolution brought [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's businesses under state control. Penniless, [PAWN_nameDef] worked hard to complete [PAWN_possessive] education.

Left for dead at a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] was rescued by an old woman who ran an urbworld junkyard. The old woman forced [PAWN_nameDef] to do dangerous, demanding work.
[PAWN_nameDef] became very familiar with machines, but [PAWN_pronoun] grew up with almost no other experiences.

[PAWN_nameDef] was born on the dark edge of a tidally-locked urbworld. After an argument, [PAWN_possessive] gene mother sold [PAWN_objective] to a local district lord as a slave artist.
Forced to create art or be punished, [PAWN_pronoun] withdrew and became unable to form relations with others.

Stripped of [PAWN_possessive] life's work and exiled after [PAWN_possessive] unethical experiments on the survivors of the Callos IX incident were published, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the skills necessary to survive in the outer rim.
Continuing [PAWN_possessive] research with nothing left to lose, [PAWN_pronoun] made minions to carry out the tasks that bored her.

A violent drifter without a home, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] gene mother fought many battles across hundreds of years. [PAWN_pronoun] became a grizzled fighter and crack shot.
After [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's death in battle, [PAWN_nameDef] began exploring the stars alone, seeking [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's hunting rifle. [PAWN_pronoun] also mastered how to construct fences to keep livestock in and the local wildlife out. [PAWN_nameDef] tried to paint a picture of [PAWN_possessive] home and learned [PAWN_pronoun] can only draw scribbles and ducks.

[PAWN_nameDef] began hearing voices. The animals were talking to [PAWN_objective], insulting her. [PAWN_pronoun] came to hate them, and eventually killed [PAWN_possessive] furry former friends. [PAWN_pronoun] started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

Jackson, in a final act of rebellion, left [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's lab and joined the local Imperial military.
[PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this [PAWN_pronoun] was one of the best on [PAWN_possessive] planet.

After [PAWN_possessive] province was besieged by one of its neighbors, [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that [PAWN_pronoun] had helped develop. The modifications allowed [PAWN_objective] to pilot the ship, but also made [PAWN_objective] less able to focus on the people around her.
By this time, people were calling [PAWN_objective] "Squirrel."

[PAWN_nameDef] sold [PAWN_objective]self into slavery for money to purchase boomrat pizza. [PAWN_pronoun] was then traded to the Zeglar colonies, where [PAWN_pronoun] worked as a prostitute.
In a fluke event, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to join other escaping slaves as they hijacked a ship. After fighting with the captain of the slave crew over the last piece of boomrat pizza, [PAWN_nameDef] was sent off the ship in an escape pod.

After years of addiction to virtual reality games, [PAWN_nameDef] was saved when the doctors unplugged her.
Unfortunately, they unplugged [PAWN_objective] during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged [PAWN_possessive] real identity and [PAWN_possessive] virtual identity, leaving [PAWN_objective] with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

Now a woman as well as proficient hunter and marksman, [PAWN_nameDef] yearned for more. [PAWN_pronoun] took leave from [PAWN_possessive] birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

[PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] teenage years as a mercenary, being hired to kill and maim others. [PAWN_pronoun] was tall, menacing, and frightening. [PAWN_pronoun] could instill fear into the hearts of any woman who crossed [PAWN_objective], and kill anyone [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

Spending [PAWN_possessive] later teenage years in a colony of settlers, [PAWN_pronoun] offered what little skills [PAWN_pronoun] had to anyone who would take her.
Being a quick learner, [PAWN_pronoun] honed many of [PAWN_possessive] skills and, apart from [PAWN_possessive] crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

[PAWN_nameDef] joined [PAWN_possessive] country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually cracked and used the skills [PAWN_pronoun] had acquired to start a mutiny on [PAWN_possessive] ship.
In the end, [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. [PAWN_pronoun] henceforth always had chefs to cook for her.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and [PAWN_pronoun] could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch.
One day, Mother said that [PAWN_possessive] final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

[PAWN_nameDef] was forced to protect [PAWN_possessive] colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite [PAWN_possessive] best efforts, [PAWN_possessive] kingdom was destroyed. [PAWN_nameDef] developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. [PAWN_pronoun] was named for the place they found her.

[PAWN_nameDef] convinced [PAWN_possessive] squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rimworlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.
[PAWN_possessive] women were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

Like [PAWN_possessive] gene mother, [PAWN_nameDef] was a systems engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] was qualified in both colony and ship systems.
When not working, [PAWN_pronoun] would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, [PAWN_pronoun] did these things mostly alone.

Ever the dreamer, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across the universe to find the thing [PAWN_pronoun] felt was calling to her.
[PAWN_pronoun] became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

Making a new life on a barely-livable planet after nuclear war, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] desires with money borrowed from [PAWN_possessive] gene mother.
[PAWN_pronoun] loved playing a particular colony simulator. [PAWN_possessive] favorite thing to do in the game was to build elaborate hospitals. Spending most of [PAWN_possessive] time playing, [PAWN_pronoun] forgot horrors of war and [PAWN_possessive] need for revenge.

[PAWN_nameDef] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] was heir of [PAWN_possessive] distant aunt's weapons-trading business.
To protect the future of the company [PAWN_pronoun] went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

[PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned chemist on a thriving midworld.
After performing inhumane experiments that turned women into beasts, [PAWN_pronoun] was arrested and banished to a far-off rimworld.

With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's rifle. [PAWN_pronoun] also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out.
[PAWN_pronoun] once tried to paint a picture of [PAWN_possessive] home, but discovered that [PAWN_pronoun] could only draw scribbles and ducks.

To survive, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gang often had to rob trade ships for food and supplies. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] had to kill the guards. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] had to kill the police who arrived to stop her.
After years of this, [PAWN_pronoun] became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local empire.

As a young blacksmith, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family shop was raided by the police. [PAWN_pronoun] shot two officers before they knocked [PAWN_objective] out and arrested her.
Sentenced to life in prison, [PAWN_nameDef] learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

[PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. [PAWN_pronoun] had [PAWN_possessive] women sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
[PAWN_possessive] social skills kept [PAWN_objective] on top of the political game, and [PAWN_pronoun] always had servants to cook and clean.

Alone, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to rebuild [PAWN_possessive] gene mother's life's work. [PAWN_pronoun] challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.
[PAWN_possessive] women mutinied. [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

[PAWN_nameDef] explored outlying rimworlds in hopes of finding rare treasures.
After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, [PAWN_pronoun] was betrayed by [PAWN_possessive] women. [PAWN_pronoun] survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.
[PAWN_pronoun] created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help [PAWN_objective] seek revenge.

Living for many years between three raider settlements, [PAWN_nameDef] persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old woman back to health, and many of battles.
[PAWN_pronoun] eventually took control of a violent gang.
[PAWN_nameDef] led a band of wild women in the forest. They foraged for food, hunted, and sometimes murdered more civilized people to steal their shiny objects.

After [PAWN_possessive] gene mother was deposed, [PAWN_nameDef]'s beauty led [PAWN_objective] to be forced into pornography to survive.
Over years of difficult treatments, [PAWN_possessive] body was remodeled to appear temporarily ageless. Sold to an orbital brothel, [PAWN_pronoun] became popular, with a steady stream of clients from all over the planet.

As a lawyer, [PAWN_nameDef] could convict a deaf woman for stealing music. [PAWN_possessive] sharp mind and lack of empathy let [PAWN_objective] say anything to get the other person to talk. With the right amount of money, [PAWN_pronoun] knew, any case can be won.
[PAWN_possessive] childhood cough never went away.

[PAWN_nameDef] was a deadly shot. Peace wasn't for her. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] family among the sisters that [PAWN_pronoun] spent years fighting alongside.
After most of those close to [PAWN_objective] died, [PAWN_pronoun] once again set off to lend [PAWN_possessive] gun to those who needed it - or those who could pay.

[PAWN_nameDef] joined a colony contact expeditionary force as a medic. The mission turned bad when the colonists turned out to be suffering from a zombifying disease. [PAWN_pronoun] ran and fought for days.
Cornered with wounded women, [PAWN_pronoun] sprayed enough ammunition to wear out four machine gun barrels, and learned the value of high-volume fire. But [PAWN_possessive] nickname, Noob, stuck from that day forward.

[PAWN_nameDef] designed combat modifications for frontline soldiers.
One night, in a nightmare, [PAWN_nameDef] was confronted by all the women killed by [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to travel to the rimworlds and use [PAWN_possessive] skills for good.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s birth mother was often ill, and it fell to [PAWN_objective] to run the store which was their only source of income. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a little about the exotic artifacts which [PAWN_pronoun] sold, and a lot about the art of the deal.
[PAWN_nameDef] spent her childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.
